name: Starblazer
description: Starblazer is a real-time strategy VR game, where players can engage in strategic aerial battles. Build up your fleet, devise a winning strategy, and conquer the galaxy.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: i5 or equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 1060 or equivalent Storage: 10 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: i7 or equivalent Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 1080 or equivalent Storage: 10 GB available space
